long_description: holistic studies institute is one of the nation's original and largest holistic learning centers, offering accelerated training programs for personal and spiritual enrichment as well as respected professional certification. holistic studies institute began in 1977 in new york. we also offer special workshops for continuing education and personal enrichment, special events, healing and message circles, fun fundraisers, dinners and holistic trips. his clientele includes tv and movie stars, celebrities in fashion, architecture and other professions.

generated_description: holistic studies institute is a holistic learning center that offers accelerated training programs for personal and spiritual enrichment, as well as professional certification. founded in 1977 in new york, it is one of the original and largest of its kind in the nation. the institute offers a variety of courses, including intuitive development, reiki, energy healing, and tarot, among others. it also provides workshops, special events, healing and message circles, fundraisers, dinners, and holistic trips. the founder and executive director, rev. stephen robinson, is a certified psychic-medium, a certified intuitive consultant, and an ordained spiritualist minister with over 42 years of experience in the field.
